messages.title: Clamping down on Tax Avoidance
messages.content: Labour's Parliamentary Candidate for Stone has announced his support for the action plan to tackle tax avoidance and want wealthy tax dodgers to disclose benefits. Proposed by a broad coalition of organisations including ActionAid, Christian Aid and Oxfam, the plan would tax havens for multinationals. It is estimated that it could recover £3.6 billion for the UK alone, as well as billions in poor and developing countries.

messages.title: Fighting for a fairer future
messages.content: On May 7th, residents in Stone have the opportunity to vote in the General Election as well as local elections...

keyPolicies.policyDescription:
- Increase the minimum wage to £8
- Ban exploitative zero-hour contracts
- Recruit 20,000 more nurses and 8,000 more GPs, paid for by a mansion tax
- Abolish the cruel, unfair Bedroom Tax
- Provide 25 hours of free childcare a week for working parents with three and four-year-olds

housing.content: Abolish the cruel, unfair Bedroom Tax
